wikipedia_page.main: Chris Charles (born (1976-03-07)7 March 1976) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1990s and 2000s. He played at representative level for England, and at club level for Hull Kingston Rovers, Salford and Castleford Tigers (Heritage № 782) (two spells), as a hooker, second-row, or loose forward.

link_mentions.page: List of Salford Red Devils players
response: * Chris Charles won caps for England while at Salford in 2005 France
